original: Boberg, Anders Ivar, bankdirektör, Vimmerby, f. 1/1/88 i Brunskog, Värml. 1., av Magnus B. o. Charlotta Persson. G. 25 m. Ellen Haller. — Realex. v. Karlstads h. a. 1. E. o. landskansl. i Växjö t. 18, anst. v. A-B Skånska hand rbanken 18-19, i Skand. banken sed. 19, dir. sed. 31. V. ordf. i fattigv :styr. o. pens :nd. Led. av stadsfulim.
translated: Boberg, Anders Ivar, bank director, Vimmerby, born on January 1, 1888 in Brunskog, Värmland, first-born of Magnus B. and Charlotta Persson. Married on May 25, to Ellen Haller. Completed his secondary education at Karlstad's high school. Employed as a clerk at the county governor's office in Växjö until 1918, then worked for A-B Skånska Handelsbanken from 1918-1919 and for Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken since then, becoming a director in 1931. Vice chairman of the poor relief board and pension committee. Member of the town council.
